description: This file is a React component implementing the client-side logic for a Connector Detail page, including fetching, displaying, and editing connector data.

methods.name: ConnectorClient
methods.description: React functional component for managing connector details, including loading, displaying, and editing connector configuration.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches connector data from API and updates component state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Sends updated connector data to API, then reloads data and displays confirmation message.
